divs: sighting detailsas usual, when an aircraft passes overhead i look up. this time i saw not only the plane but what at first i thought was a mylar balloon. but the object was higher than the aircraft and at the attitude. the size of the object was about the size of the small finger tip held at arm's length. this link goes to the google satellite image of where i was: *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms\sg). my exact location was on the south side of the western end of the structure located just west of the swimming pool. this is under a departure route for san francisco airport. the aircraft are approximately 10,000 to 12,000 at this point. the object i saw appeared to be slightly north and higher than the aircraft i saw. as i said, at first i thought it was a balloon. it didn't look right. the object was cylinder shaped and vertical. i pointed it out to my friend that i was talking to. he was able to locate it. the object was going up and moving back and forth as though blown by the winds. it then disappeared.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Castro Valley
There were no other sightings in Castro Valley on or around September 25th 2010
